schema.description: A detailed list of AUP events for the given time period.

dataRows.description: High-level AUP event details and a list of matching events.

items.description: AUP event details and a list of matching events.

configId.description: The contract ID for the request.

event.description: Details about DNS query or web request events.

actionId.description: A unique identifier for the action taken.

actionName.description: A descriptive name for the action identifier.

applicationId.description: A unique identifier for the application.

applicationName.description: A descriptive name for the application.

items.description: Contains resource ID-Name information.

blockDescription.description: A short description of the event.

catalogId.description: A unique identifier for the catalog.

categoryId.description: A unique identifier for the category.

categoryName.description: A descriptive name for the category identifier.

cidr.description: The IP address CIDR block for the event.

clientAgents.description: Client agent that initiated this traffic.

clientRequestId.description: A unique identifier for the request client.

confidenceId.description: A unique identifier about the event confidence level.

confidenceName.description: A descriptive name for the confidence level identifier.

configId.description: Unique identifier of the configuration for the event.

correlatedSinkholeEvents.description: Sinkhole event details if there are any co-related events from sinkhole.

items.description: Sinkhole event details and a list of matching events.

configId.description: The contract ID for the request.

correlated.description: Whether a related sinkhole event exists.

correlatedDnsEvent.description: Nested instances of the same site object.

decryptedMachineName.description: Decrypted name of the machine assigned to the request.

decryptedSourceIP.description: IP of the source machine in decrypted form for the event.

decryptedSourceIp.description: Source IP address in decrypted format of the machine assigned with the request.

dropFlag.description: Indicates if traffic was dropped by HTTP Forwarder. Either `true` or `false`. Set to `false` if the transaction is successful.

encryptedMachineName.description: Encrypted name of the machine assigned to the request.

encryptedSourceIP.description: IP of the source machine in encrypted form for the event.

encryptedSourceIp.description: Source IP address in encrypted format of the machine assigned with the request.

eventId.description: Unique ID of the event captured by the security connector.

eventTime.description: ISO 8601 timestamp marking the event detection time.

hfRedirectType.description: The redirect type for the event.

hitCount.description: Number of repeated traffic requests made to security connector from a host, within a time frame.

hostname.description: Hostname header/SNI host of the destination host.

l7Protocol.description: Application layer protocol used to communicate with the security connector. Either `DNS`, `HTTP`, or `HTTPS`.

proxyMode.description: The proxy type for HTTP forwarder. Possible values include `HTTP-Explicit` and `HTTP-Transparent`.

redirectType.description: Indicates how a request was sent to the security connector. For example: `HTTP-Explicit`.

requestId.description: Unique identifier of the request for the event.

sinkholeId.description: Unique ID of the security connector.

sourceIp.description: IP address of the machine where the event originated.

status.description: Indicates why traffic was dropped by HTTP Forwarder and any error that occurred.

statusCode.description: Response code for requests. Only applies to requests directed to HTTP Forwarder.

userAgent.description: User-agent string for HTTP-based traffic with details about the end user's browser and system.

decryptedInternalClientIp.description: The decrypted IP address of the client machine.

decryptedInternalClientName.description: The decrypted name of the client machine.

deepScanReportDetail.description: Details of the deepscan report for the event.

deepScanned.description: Whether the event generated a deepscan report using static and dynamic malware analysis.

deepscanReportPath.description: The location of a deepscan report.

detectionTime.description: The event detected time in ISO 8601 format.

detectionType.description: Event detected during online or while offline batch processing. Either `ONLINE` or `OFFLINE`.

deviceId.description: A unique identifier for the device for an event.

deviceName.description: The name of the device for an event.

deviceOwnerId.description: Unique identifier of the device owner for the event.

devicePostureRisk.description: Device posture risk level for the event. Either `low` or `medium` based on risk tiers defined in [Enterprise Application Access](https://techdocs.akamai.com/etp-reporting/reference/https://techdocs.akamai.com/eaa/docs/define-device-risk-tiers)

items.description: DLP file scan details.

dictionaryId.description: Unique ID of the dictionary matched during scan.

fileHash.description: SHA-256 file hash of the scanned file.

fileSize.description: File size of the scanned file in bytes.

fileType.description: MIME file extension of the scanned file.

isUpload.description: Includes this data in the upload flow.

patternId.description: Lists IDs of the patterns matched during scan.

scanStatus.description: Scan status of this record. Values include `Scan Error: Scan Timeout`, `Scan Error`, `Scan Complete: Monitor`, `Scan Complete: Block`, `Scan Complete`, `Unscannable: Encrypted File`, `Unscannable: Super-compressed File`, `Unscannable: Regex Scan Error` or `Scan Error`.

dohAttribution.description: Unique identifier of DNS over HTTP attribution for the event.

encryptedInternalClientIp.description: The encrypted IP address of the client machine.

encryptedInternalClientName.description: The encrypted name of the client machine.

eventType.description: Indicates the type of event, either `aup` or `avc`.

files.description: File information detected during scan if any.

items.description: DLP file scan details.

dictionaryId.description: Unique ID of the dictionary matched during scan.

fileHash.description: SHA-256 file hash of the scanned file.

fileSize.description: File size of the scanned file in bytes.

fileType.description: MIME file extension of the scanned file.

isUpload.description: Includes this data in the upload flow.

patternId.description: Lists IDs of the patterns matched during scan.

scanStatus.description: Scan status of this record. Values include `Scan Error: Scan Timeout`, `Scan Error`, `Scan Complete: Monitor`, `Scan Complete: Block`, `Scan Complete`, `Unscannable: Encrypted File`, `Unscannable: Super-compressed File`, `Unscannable: Regex Scan Error` or `Scan Error`.

httpUserAgent.description: The HTTP user agent for an event.

httpVersion.description: The version of HTTP protocol used.

internalClientIP.description: The IP address of the internal client device used for web traffic.

kid.description: Identifier for a specific JSON web key.

listId.description: A unique identifier for the list.

listIdentifiers.description: The scanning results from various classifiers. Only available for web requests.

categoryId.description: A unique identifier for the category.

categoryName.description: A descriptive name for the category.

confidenceId.description: A unique identifier about the event confidence level.

confidenceName.description: A descriptive name for the confidence level.

listId.description: A unique identifier for the list.

listName.description: A descriptive name for the list.

threatId.description: A unique identifier about the threat.

threatName.description: A descriptive name for the threat.

listName.description: A descriptive name for the list identifier.

machineId.description: Unique identifier of the machine for the event.

machineName.description: Name of the machine for the event.

matchedGroups.description: Matched groups for the authenticated user, for traffic authenticated against the IDP.

observedAupCategories.description: Observed AUP categories for the event.

onRamp.description: Indicates an enabled proxy onramp. Either `Yes` or `No`.

onrampType.description: The type of onramp for the event. Either `dns`, `web`, `onramp_dns`, `etp_client`, `etp_offnet_client`, or `explicit_policy`.

operationId.description: Operation ID for the accessed domain or URL.

operationName.description: Operation name for the accessed domain or URL.

policyId.description: A unique identifier for the policy.

policyName.description: The descriptive name of the matching policy.

reason.description: The reason for the traffic block.

scId.description: Unique identifier of security connector for the event.

scName.description: Name of security connector for the event.

securityCategoryId.description: Unique identifier of the security category for the event.

securityCategoryName.description: Name of the security category for the event.

severityId.description: Indicates the severity of the threat. Refer to [Severity levels](https://techdocs.akamai.com/etp/docs/indicator-search#severity-levels) for more details.

severityLevel.description: A description of the severity level.

siteId.description: A unique identifier for the site.

siteName.description: The descriptive name of the source location or branch.

sublocationId.description: Sublocation identifier where the traffic originated.

sublocationName.description: Sublocation name where the traffic originated.

threatId.description: A unique identifier for a threat event.

threatName.description: The descriptive name for the threat event.

transportType.description: Transport or layer 4 protocol for the event. In this case, whether TCP or the UDP was used. If these protocols are not used, no information is shown in this field.

trigger.description: Event triggered due to domain or IP policy settings.

id.description: A unique identifier for the column object.

isEvent.description: Indicates if the event is an AUP event.

l7Protocol.description: The layer 7 protocol used to make the DNS query or web request. Either `DNS`, `HTTP`, or `HTTPS`.

deviceId.description: ID of the device.

deviceOwnerId.description: Unique identifier for the device owner.

queryType.description: The DNS query type, such as `A` or `CNAME`.

resolved.description: The details about the requested DNS query resolution.

asName.description: Autonomous system name used for resolution.

asn.description: Autonomous system number used for resolution.

type.description: DNS resolution type. For example: `A` or `CNAME`.

time.description: Time of DNS request in ISO 8601 format.

request.description: The details about the web request.

clientIP.description: The IP address of the source NAT branch or machine.

clientPort.description: The TCP port used by the client machine to connect the destination.

connectionId.description: The unique identifier of the TCP connection created.

destinationIP.description: The IP address of the target machine to send the request.

destinationPort.description: The TCP port used to connect the destination machine.

schema.description: Provides a list of IOC changes.

iocChanges.description: Provides a list of IOC changes.

items.description: Details of IOC changes for the given domain.

key.description: The IOC context key. Either `REGISTRAR_NAME`, `REGISTRANT_NAME`, `REGISTRANT_ORG`, `CONTACT_EMAIL`, `REGISTRANT_EMAIL`, `REGISTRANT_ADDRESS`, `REGISTRANT_CITY`, `REGISTRANT_STATE`, `REGISTRANT_COUNTRY`, `REGISTRANT_TELEPHONE`, `WHO_IS_SERVER`, `CREATED_ON`, `EXPIRES_ON`, `LAST_UPDATED_ON`, `NAME_SERVER_NAMES`, `NAME_SERVER_IPS`, `CONFIDENCE`, `DESCRIPTION`, `URLS`, `THREAT_ID`, `CATEGORIES`, `AVC_APP_ID`, `AVC_CAT_ID`, `AVC_RISK_ID`, `AVC_OPERATIONS`, `AVC_TAGS`, `AVC_PROXY`, or `AVC_CURATION`.

listId.description: The unique identifier of the list for the record.

listName.description: The name of the list for the record.

newValue.description: The current categorization name of the record.

oldValue.description: The previous categorization name of the record.

order.description: The categorization order for the record.

recordType.description: Specifies the type of record. Either `DOMAIN` or `IP`.

state.description: Details the status of the record. Either `ADDED`, `REMOVED`, `CHANGED`, or `READDED`.

iocInformation.description: Provides registration details for a domain.

items.description: Details of AVC info related to IOC.

appId.description: Unique identifier for the application's AVC category.

categoryId.description: A unique identifier for the category.

operations.description: List of operations for the IOC AVC event.

riskId.description: A unique identifier for the risk category.

categoryInfo.description: Category information for a domain or IP.

categoryId.description: A unique identifier for the category.

confidenceId.description: The confidence level of the list entry. Either `SUSPECTED` or `KNOWN`.

confidenceName.description: The name of the confidence level.

createDate.description: The registration date of the domain in ISO 8601 format.

expiryDate.description: The expiration date of the domain registration in ISO 8601 format.

lastModifiedDate.description: The last modified date of the domain in ISO 8601 format.

nameServerIPs.description: A list of name server IP addresses for a domain.

nameServerNames.description: A list of name servers for a domain.

recordType.description: Specifies the type of record. Either `DOMAIN` or `IP`.

registrantAddress.description: The address of the domain registrant.

registrantCity.description: The city of the domain registrant.

registrantCountry.description: The country of the domain registrant.

registrantEmails.description: A list of email addresses for the domain registrant.

registrantName.description: The name of the domain registrant.

registrantOrganization.description: The organization of the domain registrant.

registrantState.description: The state of country of the domain registrant.

registrarName.description: The name of the domain registrar.

threatInformation.description: List of all IOC threat information.

items.description: Threat information properties.

categoryId.description: Category of the threat.

confidenceId.description: Confidence level for the threat. Use `1` for a suspected item and `2` for a known item. `0` is the default, and indicates an unknown confidence level for the list item.

severityId.description: Threat severity level. Either `0` - Unclassified, `1` - Critical, `2` - High, `3` - Medium, or `4` - Low. Refer to [Severity levels](https://techdocs.akamai.com/etp/docs/indicator-search#severity-levels) for more details.

severityLevel.description: Severity level of the threat. Either `Unclassified`, `Critical`, `High`, `Medium`, or `Low`. Refer to [Severity levels](https://techdocs.akamai.com/etp/docs/indicator-search#severity-levels) for more details.

whoisServer.description: The name of server of the domain registrant.
